title: Mini Airports
description:
Mini Airports is  a game about efficient air transport planning. Can you strategically plan the transport routes around the world?

-Each game is unique due to the random location of the airports.

-The game is set in the real world.

-You have to take in account the weather conditions.
descriptionHTML:
Mini Airports is a game about efficient air transport planning. Can you strategically plan the transport routes around the world?

-Each game is unique due to the random location of the airports.

-The game is set in the real world.

-You have to take in account the weather conditions.
summary: Mini Airports is  a game about efficient air transport planning.
recentChanges:
• UI improvement,
• characters added,
• minor bugs fixes.
comments: I dont get this. Europe which is basicly lv 1 is totaly simple. While rome is basicly lv 2 is totally difficult. I always get up to march and instantly fail. Even tho i have tryed many many other ways i couldnt ever pass 60 days. And its reauired 70 days to unlock i think usa. Can somebody help me please cuz i am geting complitly mad at it even tho i wanna enyoj the gamr. Thank you
It would be better if the game has a "Save Game" button,because it is a bit annoying that every time you play the game,you have to do everything from the start.
Good game but could use better graphics.
Nice one similar like mini metro

title: Escape Balls : The Premium Survival Game
description:
Adventures than Your Thinking! this is an epic 2D arcade game with different Levels dozens of obstacles. 

Escape Ball is The Premium Survival Game which has five levels And one infinite levels.
In this game Control ball with your finger form falling different obstacles . there is first Level is bronze,
with its white background and many stationary falling Obstacles . bronze level is very easy and small level.
next levels are silver and gold respectively .these levels are medium hard and there are many stationary as well as movable obstacles;
the length of these levels are large .In these levels you need to escape from tiny spaces available in between obstacles.
The next level is Diamond which is quite hard and long only some has ability to clear this level.in these level there are lots of 
movable obstacles and hidden obstacles . Finally last level is Champion level which is Hardest in all. the length of level is very long and
there are common obstacles from all levels in this. only some can clear this level.
In all except last level you have Three life which reduce when you collide with obstacle. last level you has four life .zero life results in
Game over.
In all levels we provide Pause button so you can easily pause your game.


Game Main Features-

Different Levels 
Different Obstacles
Endless gam paly
epic survival from Obstacle
Different Background


In Escape Ball there is one endless level which called as practise level. In that level you need to collect balls to increases  your score.

Escape Ball is The Premium Survival Game which has five levels And one infinite levels.
In this game Control ball with your finger form falling different obstacles . there is first Level is bronze,
with its white background and many stationary falling Obstacles . bronze level is very easy and small level.
next levels are silver and gold respectively .these levels are medium hard and there are many stationary as well as movable obstacles;
the length of these levels are large .In these levels you need to escape from tiny spaces available in between obstacles.
The next level is Diamond which is quite hard and long only some has ability to clear this level.in these level there are lots of
movable obstacles and hidden obstacles . Finally last level is Champion level which is Hardest in all. the length of level is very long and
there are common obstacles from all levels in this. only some can clear this level.
In all except last level you have Three life which reduce when you collide with obstacle. last level you has four life .zero life results in
Game over.
In all levels we provide Pause button so you can easily pause your game.


Game Main Features-

Different Obstacles
Endless gam paly
epic survival from Obstacle
Different Background


In Escape Ball there is one endless level which called as practise level. In that level you need to collect balls to increases your score.
summary: Escape Through Falling Obstacles With Yours Control ability.

title: Crystals clicker - The most expensive game
description:
Crystals clicker - the most expensive clicker. In this game you have to click on crystal and score a score. Goal of the game score 100000 points. 

You can click on x2 button and during 1 minute when you click you score 2 points.

stop hesitating! enter the game and become the best!
descriptionHTML:
Crystals clicker - the most expensive clicker. In this game you have to click on crystal and score a score. Goal of the game score 100000 points.

You can click on x2 button and during 1 minute when you click you score 2 points.

stop hesitating! enter the game and become the best!
summary: Most expensive clicker. Click click click and score a score.
comments: Pointless and boring. What more is there to say about this... game?
